title: Morel Mushroom Tartine With Chives Recipe
full_text:
Morel Mushroom Tartine With Chives Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
5 mins

10 mins
Total
10 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
4
slices
toasted hearty
bread
1
tablespoon
extra virgin olive oil
1
piece
sautéed
morel mushrooms
1
tbsp chopped
snipped
chives
Directions
Drizzle toast with olive oil. Top with mushrooms and their pan sauce. Garnish with chives and drizzle with a little more olive oil before serving.
